body.name: UBeesize Magnetic Tripod Mount Holder for MagSafe Phones – Double-360° Rotatable Magnetic Stand Base for iPhone 14/13/12 Smartphone Clip Adapter Upgrade
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 4 hrs 7 mins
features: 【Magnetic Design to Hold Phone】 The phone light tripod mount features a built-in magnet and strong magnetic adsorption, which can hold your phone securely. The tripod magnetic mount adapter is designed for iPhone 12/13/14 series. We provide two extra metal rings for other smartphones so they can also be used with the magnetic tripod mount.

【Upgraded 360° Rotatable Holder】Compared to the old magnetic phone holder, our upgraded magnetic tripod mount includes a 360° base. With the previous ball bottom, you can adjust it to different angles conveniently as needed. The holder plate can be placed on any diameter 1cm balls. Simply turn the phone of the tripod holder base to illuminate your beauty. This tripod phone holder is perfect for live-streaming, selfies, shooting videos, or makeup fill light.

【Premium Material and Portability】The Magnet Tripod Holder is made of ABS material, and the surface of the round bracket has an anti-scratch and anti-rust coating, preventing long-term scratches and metal rusting. The tripod mount holder for magsafe is only about 4.6" x 2.3" x 1.4", making it portable and easy to carry around.

【For Magsafe Wireless Charger】The Magnetic Tripod Holder Mount is designed for Wireless Chargers. We provide an extra mount base specially designed for wireless chargers, allowing you to put the magnetic charger in the mount base while using your phone on our tripod holder stand mount while charging it.

【Easy to Install and Compatible with All Tripods and Stands】This tripod phone holder has a 1/4 screw that is compatible with all tripods, selfie lights, fill lights, and ring lights. It can be quickly mounted to equipment by tightening the tripod phone magnetic bracket to the screw, and it works perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am very please with this MagSafe iPhone holder/tripod adapter
reviews.reviewText: This MagSafe tripod adapter is VERY GOOD!! The magnetic forage is very strong!! My phone holds on and it just stays put!! That’s how it should be with ALL MagSafe devices… this one works very very well!!! I am very happy with it! I will buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So glad I got this add on!! Makes my life much simpler!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic for small adjustments to get a level horizon.
reviews.reviewText: Fantastic for small adjustments to get a level horizon. Also, if you need to take stills in-between making a video or make a phone call you can just pull your phone off. Magsafe / magnets are amazing for this purpose.Super easy to mount to any tripod because the base is the standard 1/4-20 female threads.CONS: while it can be mounted on a selfie stick and will stay in place unless you make a rapid movement or if you hit branches, or strong wind outside of a car while driving, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars decent but weak
reviews.reviewText: I'm surprised by the terrible market for what should be an extremely cheap and easy to make product. i think a decent one should cost about $5, but this is about double the cost. but I'll leave that aside for this review since it's still among the cheapest options.the big problem is that the magnet is too weak. it holds ok if nothing bumps it, but as soon as there's a small jostle my phone falls off. I'm disappointed. this is one product where you want to err on the too strong side, not too weak.i also don't like the ball rotation. you'd think it sounds helpful. but if you rotate it too much and then zoom all the way out, the stand itself gets into the picture! modern day equivalent of a thumb in the picture 🤣. i didn't even rotate it much, just a little off center.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars unfolds flat and has a strong magnet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Instantly broke. Poor quality, weak magnet, base does not lock in position.
reviews.reviewText: Wow. What a terrible, cheaply made, plastic piece of junk. It instantly broke. The magnet is SO weak as well. When opening the package, I thought I was missing a piece because the magnet is laughably small, thin, and weak. If you buy this, you will regret it and end up buying something else anyway.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as intended
reviews.reviewText: I love taking self-portraits using my ring light and using a clip-on mount is just really bothersome so this really helps a lot. It also includes other parts that can also be used in different kinds of tripods and a stick-on metal piece that can be used for Magsafe products as well. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Good magnet flawed design
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this just over a month ago and it just broke. The magnet worked well. Unfortunately, the ball joint that connects to the back plate is connected by a cylindrical piece of plastic that is less than a 1/4 inch in diameter. More than several pounds of pressure is enough to break it rendering the item unusable. Make that connection point thicker!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: These are crap do not waste your money
reviews.reviewText: Held together with screws that are to small for the jog mine ripped the screw out when I tried to adjust the position of the phone holder
Not enough instructions for all the pieces in the box. But I am able to use one of the mounts so not totally useless
Easy to use, lightweight and the cushion on the inside is a great touch that helps keep the mount secure. I also appreciate the adjustable closure.

reviews.reviewTitle: It was supposed to come with the ring light
reviews.reviewText: This is an accessory that came with a ring light & stand. It was pictured in the purchase but not included in the box. It only works on the top shaft section of all 5 sections. It does not appear to have been designed for the size of tubes the light uses - because even on the smallest diameter tube it's hard to get the connector to fasten as it's really dimensioned for 1/4" to 3/8" max. The smallest diameter shaft is >1/2". If they'd used the same rubber size they used on the light stand itself it would work but it's clumsy to use the way it came. However it's usable enough not to be worth sending back. Clearly not a product designed by someone that cares about important details - but one that will ALWAYS remind me that it was kludged together by someone rather careless about customer satisfaction.
